subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: It was hardly a Willis Reed moment, but the Rangers and the early-arriving crowd at Madison Square Garden got a lift Sunday night when forward Sean Avery hopped onto the ice for the first time in a month.
snippet: It was hardly a Willis Reed moment, but the Rangers and the early-arriving crowd at Madison Square Garden got a lift Sunday night when forward Sean Avery hopped onto the ice for the first time in a month.
